name: PT Makmur Sejahtera Organik
description: Provider of a cold chain delivery service intended to deliver fresh food and frozen food overnight delivery using a motorcycle freezer box. The company's logistics system installs a temperature-controlled storage box on motorcycles for shipping fresh and frozen products, enabling clients to deliver at the right temperature.
one_liner: Provider of a cold chain delivery service intended to deliver fresh food and frozen food overnight delivery using a motorcycle freezer box. The company's logistics system installs a temperature-controlled storage box on motorcycles for shipping fresh and frozen products, enabling clients to deliver at the right temperature.
